show-heartbeat recipes should store and check a date when they display, and if a show-heartbeat recipe has executed and displayed a prompt to the user within the past 24 hours, other show-heartbeat recipes should not prompt the user.
This should be separate from checking if the prompt has been shown recently, so that if a user gets 2 recipes, that 1 of them will show one day, and then the next day it will see that it has shown recently and not run, allowing the second recipe to show instead.

title: Only display one `show-heartbeat` prompt a day
body:
`show-heartbeat` recipes should store and check a date when they display, and if a `show-heartbeat` recipe has executed and displayed a prompt to the user within the past 24 hours, other `show-heartbeat` recipes should not prompt the user.

This should be separate from checking if the prompt has been shown recently, so that if a user gets 2 recipes, that 1 of them will show one day, and then the next day it will see that it has shown recently and not run, allowing the second recipe to show instead.
